header.title: phpBb Easy Pages MOD
header.description: This mod allow administrators to define a forum as a dynamic pages container. The posts created in this forum can be accessed like normal posts but can also be accessed as "pages", which permits to display only post content and to not display post information (author name, avatar, etc). This allow to easily create dynamic pages by using default forms and default bbcode tags.
